        value - The value.
        minimum - The minimum value.
        maximum - The maximum value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the name is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the maximum is less than the minimum.

      • getLabelComponentWithMax

        public com.valkryst.VTerminal.component.Label getLabelComponentWithMax()
        Retrieves a label component where the ID is set to the stat's name and the text is set to contain the name and current value. Unlike the default getLabelComponent function, this one returns a label with the maximum value listed.
        Returns:
        The label component that represents the statistic.
